Infinite series §


                  
                  Warning 
                  
                
Infinite sums for smooth exponential, trigonometric, and binomial functions are valid only for ∣x∣<1.

1. Exponential and Logarithmic §
ex=1+x+2!x2​+...=k=1∑∞​k!xk​
ln(1+x)=x−2x2​+3x3​−...
k=0∑∞​(2k+1)(2k+2)1​=2×31​+4×51​+...=ln2
k=0∑∞​2kk1​=ln2
2. Trigonometric §
sin(x)=x−3!x3​+5!x5​+...
sinh(x)=x+3!x3​+5!x5​+...
3. Binomial §
(1+x)α=k=0∑∞​αCk​⋅xk
(1−x)−α=k=0∑∞​α+k−1Ck​⋅xk
4. Riemann zeta function §
k=1∑∞​k21​=ζ(2)=6π2​
k=1∑∞​k41​=ζ(4)=45π4​
k=1∑∞​k61​=ζ(2)=945π6​
5. Alternating harmonic §
From series ln(1+x):
1−21​+31​−41​+...=ln(2)
1−31​+51​−71​+...=4π​
6. Reciprocal of factorials §
Can be derived from Exponential series:
1+1!1​+2!1​+3!1​+...=e
0!1​+2!1​+4!1​+6!1​+...=21​(e+e1​)=cosh(1)
